safe-load-indicator-eot-crane.name: Safe Load Indicator for EOT Cranes
safe-load-indicator-eot-crane.tagline: Real-time load monitoring and safety automation for incident-free operation
safe-load-indicator-eot-crane.overview: The Hejaaz Safe Load Indicator (SLI) for EOT cranes delivers continuous, real-time load monitoring and safety automation for Electric Overhead Travelling cranes. It protects operators, loads, and equipment through overload prevention, anti-tilt control, and rope-slack detection—keeping your shop-floor and warehouse lifts safe and compliant.

systemLayout.title: System layout – EOT crane
systemLayout.description: The EOT SLI system integrates with your crane’s main and auxiliary hooks, measuring load at the hook or via rope clamp / tensiometer. A central 4-inch display shows live weight and capacity, while ATP (anti-tilt) and Modbus modules support automation and interlocks. Anti-tilt limits are configurable (e.g. +5° / -5°) to suit your layout.
items: Main hook and auxiliary hook load measurement
Load pin or rope clamp / tensiometer

keyFeatures: Wireless calibration via mobile or web—no ladder or cab access required
Multi-load calibration (up to 8 points) for high accuracy across the range
Single unified display for main and auxiliary hook data
Real-time multi-hook load and percentage capacity
Error indication (ERR 1, ERR 2) for quick diagnostics

safetyParameters.title: Overload protection
safetyParameters.description: OVLD alarm with buzzer and hoist cutoff when safe capacity is exceeded.

safetyParameters.title: Anti-tilt (ATP)
safetyParameters.description: Monitors crane inclination and triggers alarm/cutoff if limits are exceeded.

safetyParameters.title: Rope slack detection
safetyParameters.description: Detects slack rope conditions and alerts the operator to prevent damage or fouling.

safetyParameters.title: Anemometer (wind speed)
safetyParameters.description: Optional wind-speed cutoff for indoor-outdoor installations.

safetyParameters.title: Error indication
safetyParameters.description: ERR 1, ERR 2 and related codes for fault diagnosis and maintenance.

smartCalibration.title: Smart calibration & control
smartCalibration.description: Calibrate and configure the EOT SLI from a browser—no dedicated software or dongles. Use a smartphone, tablet, or laptop on your site Wi-Fi to set capacity, alarm levels, and anti-tilt limits remotely.
points: Works on mobile, tablet, or laptop
Remote value setting and parameter updates
Angle reset and multi-point calibration support

safe-load-indicator-gantry-crane.name: Safe Load Indicator for Gantry Cranes
safe-load-indicator-gantry-crane.tagline: Outdoor-ready load monitoring and wind-aware safety for gantry operations
safe-load-indicator-gantry-crane.overview: The Hejaaz SLI for gantry cranes is built for rail-mounted and rubber-tyred gantry applications, including ports, yards, and heavy fabrication. It provides real-time load monitoring, overload protection, and optional wind-speed cutoffs—critical for outdoor, exposed environments where wind can affect safe operation.

systemLayout.title: System layout – gantry crane
systemLayout.description: The gantry SLI layout emphasises outdoor use and wind monitoring. Load is measured at the hook via load pin or rope clamp / tensiometer. A 4-inch display, ATP module, and optional anemometer integrate into one system. Anti-tilt and wind-speed limits are configurable to match your site and crane type.
items: Main and auxiliary hook load measurement
Load pin or rope clamp / tensiometer
Anemometer (wind speed) integration for outdoor use

keyFeatures: Wireless, web-based calibration via mobile or laptop—suited to yard and port use
Multi-load calibration (up to 8 points) for accuracy across the full range
Single unified display for main and auxiliary hook
Real-time multi-hook load and percentage capacity
Error indication (ERR 1, ERR 2) for fast diagnostics

safetyParameters.title: Error indication
